---------------------------
Is there a chance of having any of the following added to the in-game interface:

* Allied ultimate timers (displaying cooldown duration, not just on-CD/off-CD)
* Allied summoner spell cooldown durations
* Summoner spells displaying the current value on the icon (Ignite damage, Heal amount, Barrier shield amount) to match Smite

You already display the cooldown timers for summoner spells and ultimates in the spectator display.  Is there a reason that a similar display couldn't be included in-game?

Similarly, you already display the damage dealt by Smite on the interface.  Would it be difficult to do the same for Ignite, Heal, and Barrier for the sake of clarity?

Thanks for the feedback. We are considering timers for post launch.

Hadn't considered Ignite, Heal, and Barrier, but that might make a nice addition.

> Summoner spells displaying the current value on the icon (Ignite damage, Heal amount, Barrier shield amount) to match Smite

I don't think that's a good idea. You know how Jinx's minigun gives her more AS on the first stack than on the second and third, but the tooltip makes it sound like each stack is the same? It's unnecessary information that will not change how you use the ability. NOBODY is going to be able to look at the number on Heal and decide in an instant whether it will be enough to save them.

It shouldn't be a complicated change (it has already been done for Smite) and it would be nice to know it off-hand without having to hover over the ability.  it's not necessary by any means, but it's something small which would be nice to have.
I am loving the new interface, but the main problem I see is that you cannot check allied mana levels. It's actually pretty important to know who on your team is about to go OOM.
We are considering putting in mana/power bars on the team portraits. Stay tuned for more info regarding that.

[**TRANSPARENT HUD**] would be an awesome option. The HUD doesn't need to be completely filled in with grey. A bordered, **transparent HUD** with bright colored font will allow players complete vision of the terrain and action around the entire screen.
